fates_history_ageclass_bin_edges.long_name: Lower edges for age class bins used in age-resolved patch history output

fates_history_coageclass_bin_edges.long_name: Lower edges for cohort age class bins used in cohort age resolved history output

fates_history_height_bin_edges.long_name: Lower edges for height bins used in height-resolved history output

fates_history_damage_bin_edges.long_name: Lower edges for damage class bins used in cohort history output

fates_history_sizeclass_bin_edges.long_name: Lower edges for DBH size class bins used in size-resolved cohort history output

fates_alloc_organ_id.long_name: This is the global index that the organ in this file is associated with, values match those in parteh/PRTGenericMod.F90

fates_hydro_htftype_node.long_name: Switch that defines the hydraulic transfer functions for each organ.

fates_hydro_organ_name.long_name: Name of plant hydraulics organs (DONT CHANGE, order matches media list in FatesHydraulicsMemMod.F90)

fates_alloc_organ_name.long_name: Name of plant organs (with alloc_organ_id, must match PRTGenericMod.F90)

fates_landuseclass_name.long_name: Name of the land use classes, for variables associated with dimension fates_landuseclass

fates_litterclass_name.long_name: Name of the litter classes, for variables associated with dimension fates_litterclass

fates_alloc_storage_cushion.long_name: maximum size of storage C pool, relative to maximum size of leaf C pool

fates_alloc_store_priority_frac.long_name: for high-priority organs, the fraction of their turnover demand that is gauranteed to be replaced, and if need-be by storage

fates_allom_agb_frac.long_name: Fraction of woody biomass that is above ground

fates_allom_cmode.long_name: coarse root biomass allometry function index.

fates_allom_d2ca_coefficient_max.long_name: max (savanna) dbh to area multiplier factor where

fates_allom_d2ca_coefficient_min.long_name: min (forest) dbh to area multiplier factor where

fates_allom_d2h1.long_name: Parameter 1 for d2h allometry (intercept, or c)

fates_allom_d2h2.long_name: Parameter 2 for d2h allometry (slope, or m)

fates_allom_dbh_maxheight.long_name: the diameter (if any) corresponding to maximum height, diameters may increase beyond this

fates_allom_fmode.long_name: fine root biomass allometry function index.

fates_allom_fnrt_prof_a.long_name: Fine root profile function, parameter a

fates_allom_fnrt_prof_b.long_name: Fine root profile function, parameter b

fates_allom_fnrt_prof_mode.long_name: Index to select fine root profile function

fates_allom_frbstor_repro.long_name: fraction of bstore goes to reproduction after plant dies

fates_allom_h2cd1.long_name: Parameter 1 for h2cd allometry (exp(log-intercept) or scaling). If allom_dmode1 this is the same as former crown_depth_frac parameter

fates_allom_h2cd2.long_name: Parameter 2 for h2cd allometry (log-slope or exponent). If allom_dmode1 this is not needed (as exponent is assumed 1)

fates_allom_la_per_sa_int.long_name: Leaf area per sapwood area, intercept

fates_allom_la_per_sa_slp.long_name: Leaf area per sapwood area rate of change with height, slope (optional)

fates_allom_sai_scaler.long_name: allometric ratio of SAI per LAI

fates_allom_zroot_k.long_name: scale coefficient of logistic rooting depth model

fates_allom_zroot_max_dbh.long_name: dbh at which a plant reaches the maximum value for its maximum rooting depth

fates_allom_zroot_max_z.long_name: the maximum rooting depth defined at dbh  fates_allom_zroot_max_dbh. note

fates_allom_zroot_min_dbh.long_name: dbh at which the maximum rooting depth for a recruit is defined

fates_allom_zroot_min_z.long_name: the maximum rooting depth defined at dbh  fates_allom_zroot_min_dbh. note

fates_c2b.long_name: Carbon to biomass multiplier of bulk structural tissues

fates_cnp_eca_alpha_ptase.long_name: (INACTIVE, KEEP AT 0) fraction of P from ptase activity sent directly to plant (ECA)

fates_cnp_eca_decompmicc.long_name: maximum soil microbial decomposer biomass found over depth (will be applied at a reference depth w/ exponential attenuation) (ECA)

fates_cnp_eca_km_nh4.long_name: half-saturation constant for plant nh4 uptake (ECA)

fates_cnp_eca_km_no3.long_name: half-saturation constant for plant no3 uptake (ECA)

fates_cnp_eca_km_p.long_name: half-saturation constant for plant p uptake (ECA)

fates_cnp_eca_lambda_ptase.long_name: (INACTIVE, KEEP AT 0) critical value for biochemical production (ECA)

fates_cnp_eca_vmax_ptase.long_name: maximum production rate for biochemical P (per m2) (ECA)

fates_cnp_nfix1.long_name: fractional surcharge added to maintenance respiration that drives symbiotic fixation

fates_cnp_nitr_store_ratio.long_name: storeable (labile) N, as a ratio compared to the N bound in cell structures of other organs (see code)

fates_cnp_phos_store_ratio.long_name: storeable (labile) P, as a ratio compared to the P bound in cell structures of other organs (see code)

fates_cnp_pid_kd.long_name: derivative constant of the PID controller on adaptive fine-root biomass

fates_cnp_pid_ki.long_name: integral constant of the PID controller on adaptive fine-root biomass

fates_cnp_pid_kp.long_name: proportional constant of the PID controller on adaptive fine-root biomass

fates_cnp_prescribed_nuptake.long_name: Prescribed N uptake flux. 0fully coupled simulation >0prescribed (experimental)

fates_cnp_prescribed_puptake.long_name: Prescribed P uptake flux. 0fully coupled simulation, >0prescribed (experimental)

fates_cnp_store_ovrflw_frac.long_name: size of overflow storage (for excess C,N or P) as a fraction of storage target

fates_cnp_turnover_nitr_retrans.long_name: retranslocation (reabsorbtion) fraction of nitrogen in turnover of scenescing tissues

fates_cnp_turnover_phos_retrans.long_name: retranslocation (reabsorbtion) fraction of phosphorus in turnover of scenescing tissues

fates_cnp_vmax_nh4.long_name: maximum (potential) uptake rate of NH4 per gC of fineroot biomass (see main/EDPftvarcon.F90 vmax_nh4 for usage)

fates_cnp_vmax_no3.long_name: maximum (potential) uptake rate of NO3 per gC of fineroot biomass (see main/EDPftvarcon.F90 vmax_no3 for usage)

fates_cnp_vmax_p.long_name: maximum production rate for phosphorus (ECA and RD)

fates_damage_frac.long_name: fraction of cohort damaged in each damage event (event frequency specified in the is_it_damage_time subroutine)

fates_damage_mort_p1.long_name: inflection point of damage mortality function, a value of 0.8 means 50% mortality with 80% loss of crown, turn off with a large number

fates_damage_mort_p2.long_name: rate of mortality increase with damage

fates_damage_recovery_scalar.long_name: fraction of the cohort that recovers from damage

fates_dev_arbitrary_pft.long_name: Unassociated pft dimensioned free parameter that developers can use for testing arbitrary new hypotheses

fates_fire_alpha_SH.long_name: spitfire parameter, alpha scorch height, Equation 16 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_bark_scaler.long_name: the thickness of a cohorts bark as a fraction of its dbh

fates_fire_crown_kill.long_name: fire parameter, see equation 22 in Thonicke et al 2010

fates_frag_seed_decay_rate.long_name: fraction of seeds that decay per year

fates_hydro_avuln_gs.long_name: shape parameter for stomatal control of water vapor exiting leaf

fates_hydro_fcap_node.long_name: fraction of non-residual water that is capillary in source

fates_hydro_kmax_node.long_name: maximum xylem conductivity per unit conducting xylem area

fates_hydro_p50_gs.long_name: water potential at 50% loss of stomatal conductance

fates_hydro_p50_node.long_name: xylem water potential at 50% loss of conductivity

fates_hydro_rfrac_stem.long_name: fraction of total tree resistance from troot to canopy

fates_hydro_vg_alpha_node.long_name: (used if hydr_htftype_node  2), capillary length parameter in van Genuchten model

fates_hydro_vg_m_node.long_name: (used if hydr_htftype_node  2),m in van Genuchten 1980 model, 2nd pore size distribution parameter

fates_hydro_vg_n_node.long_name: (used if hydr_htftype_node  2),n in van Genuchten 1980 model, pore size distribution parameter

fates_landuse_grazing_palatability.long_name: Relative intensity of leaf grazing/browsing per PFT

fates_landuse_harvest_pprod10.long_name: fraction of harvest wood product that goes to 10-year product pool (remainder goes to 100-year pool)

fates_landuse_luc_frac_burned.long_name: fraction of land use change-generated and not-exported material that is burned (the remainder goes to litter)

fates_landuse_luc_frac_exported.long_name: fraction of land use change-generated wood material that is exported to wood product (the remainder is either burned or goes to litter)

fates_landuse_luc_pprod10.long_name: fraction of land use change wood product that goes to 10-year product pool (remainder goes to 100-year pool)

fates_leaf_agross_btran_model.long_name: model switch for how gross assimilation affects conductance. See LeafBiophysicsMod.F90, integer constants

fates_leaf_fnps.long_name: fraction of light absorbed by non-photosynthetic pigments

fates_leaf_slamax.long_name: Maximum Specific Leaf Area (SLA), even if under a dense canopy

fates_leaf_slatop.long_name: Specific Leaf Area (SLA) at top of canopy, projected area basis

fates_leaf_stomatal_btran_model.long_name: model switch for how btran affects conductance. See LeafBiophysicsMod.F90, integer constants

fates_leaf_stomatal_intercept.long_name: Minimum unstressed stomatal conductance for Ball-Berry model and Medlyn model

fates_leaf_stomatal_slope_ballberry.long_name: stomatal slope parameter, as per Ball-Berry

fates_leaf_stomatal_slope_medlyn.long_name: stomatal slope parameter, as per Medlyn

fates_leaf_vcmax25top.long_name: maximum carboxylation rate of Rub. at 25C, canopy top

fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff1.long_name: Coefficient one for decrease in leaf nitrogen through the canopy, from Lloyd et al. 2010.

fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff2.long_name: Coefficient two for decrease in leaf nitrogen through the canopy, from Lloyd et al. 2010.

fates_maintresp_leaf_atkin2017_baserate.long_name: Leaf maintenance respiration base rate parameter (r0) per Atkin et al 2017

fates_maintresp_leaf_ryan1991_baserate.long_name: Leaf maintenance respiration base rate per Ryan et al 1991

fates_maintresp_leaf_vert_scaler_coeff1.long_name: Leaf maintenance respiration decrease through the canopy. Only applies to Atkin et al. 2017. For proportionality between photosynthesis and respiration through the canopy, match with fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff1.

fates_maintresp_leaf_vert_scaler_coeff2.long_name: Leaf maintenance respiration decrease through the canopy. Only applies to Atkin et al. 2017. For proportionality between photosynthesis and respiration through the canopy, match with fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff2.

fates_maintresp_reduction_curvature.long_name: curvature of MR reduction as f(carbon storage), 1linear, 0very curved

fates_maintresp_reduction_intercept.long_name: intercept of MR reduction as f(carbon storage), 0no throttling, 1max throttling

fates_maintresp_reduction_upthresh.long_name: upper threshold for storage biomass (relative to leaf biomass) above which MR is not reduced

fates_mort_hf_flc_threshold.long_name: plant fractional loss of conductivity at which drought mortality begins for hydraulic model

fates_mort_hf_sm_threshold.long_name: soil moisture (btran units) at which drought mortality begins for non-hydraulic model

fates_mort_ip_age_senescence.long_name: Mortality cohort age senescence inflection point. If _ this mortality term is off. Setting this value turns on age dependent mortality.

fates_mort_ip_size_senescence.long_name: Mortality dbh senescence inflection point. If _ this mortality term is off. Setting this value turns on size dependent mortality

fates_mort_prescribed_canopy.long_name: mortality rate of canopy trees for prescribed physiology mode

fates_mort_prescribed_understory.long_name: mortality rate of understory trees for prescribed physiology mode

fates_mort_r_age_senescence.long_name: Mortality age senescence rate of change. Sensible range is around 0.03-0.06. Larger values givesteeper mortality curves.

fates_mort_r_size_senescence.long_name: Mortality dbh senescence rate of change. Sensible range is around 0.03-0.06. Larger values give steeper mortality curves.

fates_mort_scalar_coldstress.long_name: maximum mortality rate from cold stress

fates_mort_scalar_cstarvation.long_name: maximum mortality rate from carbon starvation

fates_mort_scalar_hydrfailure.long_name: maximum mortality rate from hydraulic failure

fates_mort_upthresh_cstarvation.long_name: threshold for storage biomass (relative to target leaf biomass) above which carbon starvation is zero

fates_nonhydro_smpsc.long_name: Soil water potential at full stomatal closure

fates_nonhydro_smpso.long_name: Soil water potential at full stomatal opening

fates_phen_cold_size_threshold.long_name: the dbh size above which will lead to phenology-related stem and leaf drop

fates_phen_drought_threshold.long_name: threshold for drought phenology (or lower threshold for semi-deciduous PFTs) the quantity depends on the sign

fates_phen_flush_fraction.long_name: Upon bud-burst, the maximum fraction of storage carbon used for flushing leaves

fates_phen_fnrt_drop_fraction.long_name: fraction of fine roots to drop during drought/cold

fates_phen_leaf_habit.long_name: Flag for leaf phenology habit. 1 - evergreen 2 - season (cold) deciduous 3 - stress (hydro) deciduous 4 - stress (hydro) semi-deciduous

fates_phen_mindaysoff.long_name: day threshold compared against days since leaves abscised (shed)

fates_phen_moist_threshold.long_name: upper threshold for drought phenology (only for drought semi-deciduous PFTs) the quantity depends on the sign

fates_phen_stem_drop_fraction.long_name: fraction of stems to drop for non-woody species during drought/cold

fates_prescribed_npp_canopy.long_name: NPP per unit crown area of canopy trees for prescribed physiology mode

fates_prescribed_npp_understory.long_name: NPP per unit crown area of understory trees for prescribed physiology mode

fates_rad_leaf_clumping_index.long_name: factor describing how much self-occlusion of leaf scattering elements decreases light interception

fates_recruit_height_min.long_name: the minimum height (ie starting height) of a newly recruited plant

fates_recruit_init_density.long_name: initial seedling density for a cold-start near-bare-ground simulation. If negative sets initial tree dbh - only to be used in nocomp mode

fates_recruit_prescribed_rate.long_name: recruitment rate for prescribed physiology mode

fates_recruit_seed_alloc.long_name: fraction of available carbon balance allocated to seeds

fates_recruit_seed_alloc_mature.long_name: fraction of available carbon balance allocated to seeds in mature plants (adds to fates_seed_alloc)

fates_recruit_seed_dbh_repro_threshold.long_name: the diameter where the plant will increase allocation to the seed pool by fraction

fates_recruit_seed_germination_rate.long_name: fraction of seeds that germinate per year

fates_recruit_seed_supplement.long_name: Supplemental external seed rain source term (non-mass conserving)

fates_seed_dispersal_fraction.long_name: fraction of seed rain to be dispersed to other grid cells

fates_seed_dispersal_max_dist.long_name: maximum seed dispersal distance for a given pft

fates_seed_dispersal_pdf_scale.long_name: seed dispersal probability density function scale parameter, A, Table 1 Bullock et al 2016

fates_seed_dispersal_pdf_shape.long_name: seed dispersal probability density function shape parameter, B, Table 1 Bullock et al 2016

fates_stoich_nitr.long_name: target nitrogen concentration (ratio with carbon) of organs

fates_stoich_phos.long_name: target phosphorus concentration (ratio with carbon) of organs

fates_trim_inc.long_name: Arbitrary incremental change in trimming function.

fates_trim_limit.long_name: Arbitrary limit to reductions in leaf area with stress

fates_trs_repro_alloc_a.long_name: shape parameter for sigmoidal function relating dbh to reproductive allocation

fates_trs_repro_alloc_b.long_name: intercept parameter for sigmoidal function relating dbh to reproductive allocation

fates_trs_repro_frac_seed.long_name: fraction of reproductive mass that is seed

fates_trs_seedling_a_emerg.long_name: mean fraction of seed bank emerging

fates_trs_seedling_b_emerg.long_name: seedling emergence sensitivity to soil moisture

fates_trs_seedling_light_rec_a.long_name: coefficient in light-based seedling to sapling transition

fates_trs_seedling_light_rec_b.long_name: coefficient in light-based seedling to sapling transition

fates_trs_seedling_mdd_crit.long_name: critical moisture deficit (suction) day accumulation for seedling moisture-based seedling mortality to begin

fates_trs_seedling_psi_crit.long_name: critical soil moisture (suction) for seedling stress

fates_trs_seedling_psi_emerg.long_name: critical soil moisture for seedling emergence

fates_turb_displar.long_name: Ratio of displacement height to canopy top height

fates_turb_z0mr.long_name: Ratio of momentum roughness length to canopy top height

fates_turnover_leaf_canopy.long_name: Leaf longevity (ie turnover timescale) of canopy plants. For drought-deciduous PFTs, this also indicates the maximum length of the growing (i.e., leaves on) season.

fates_turnover_leaf_ustory.long_name: Leaf longevity (ie turnover timescale) of understory plants.

fates_turnover_senleaf_fdrought.long_name: multiplication factor for leaf longevity of senescent leaves during drought

fates_wood_density.long_name: mean density of woody tissue in plant

fates_hlm_pft_map.long_name: In fixed biogeog mode, fraction of HLM area associated with each FATES PFT

fates_fire_low_moisture_Coeff.long_name: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_low_moisture_Slope.long_name: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_mid_moisture.long_name: spitfire litter moisture threshold to be considered medium dry

fates_fire_mid_moisture_Coeff.long_name: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_mid_moisture_Slope.long_name: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_min_moisture.long_name: spitfire litter moisture threshold to be considered very dry

fates_fire_SAV.long_name: fuel surface area to volume ratio

fates_frag_maxdecomp.long_name: maximum rate of litter and CWD transfer from non-decomposing class into decomposing class

fates_frag_cwd_frac.long_name: fraction of woody (bdead+bsw) biomass destined for CWD pool

fates_landuse_crop_lu_pft_vector.long_name: the FATES PFT index to use on a given crop land-use type (dummy value of -999 for non-crop types)

fates_landuse_grazing_rate.long_name: fraction of leaf biomass consumed by grazers per day

fates_max_nocomp_pfts_by_landuse.long_name: maximum number of nocomp PFTs on each land use type (only used in nocomp mode)

fates_maxpatches_by_landuse.long_name: maximum number of patches per site on each land use type

fates_canopy_closure_thresh.long_name: tree canopy coverage at which crown area allometry changes from savanna to forest value

fates_cnp_eca_plant_escalar.long_name: scaling factor for plant fine root biomass to calculate nutrient carrier enzyme abundance (ECA)

fates_cohort_age_fusion_tol.long_name: minimum fraction in differece in cohort age between cohorts.

fates_cohort_size_fusion_tol.long_name: minimum fraction in difference in dbh between cohorts

fates_damage_canopy_layer_code.long_name: Integer code that decides whether damage affects canopy trees (1), understory trees (2)

fates_damage_event_code.long_name: Integer code that options how damage events are structured

fates_dev_arbitrary.long_name: Unassociated free parameter that developers can use for testing arbitrary new hypotheses

fates_fire_active_crown_fire.long_name: flag, 1active crown fire 0no active crown fire

fates_fire_cg_strikes.long_name: fraction of cloud to ground lightning strikes

fates_fire_drying_ratio.long_name: spitfire parameter, fire drying ratio for fuel moisture, alpha_FMC EQ 6 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_durat_slope.long_name: spitfire parameter, fire max duration slope, Equation 14 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_fdi_alpha.long_name: spitfire parameter, EQ 7 Venevsky et al. GCB 2002,(modified EQ 8 Thonicke et al. 2010)

fates_fire_fuel_energy.long_name: spitfire parameter, heat content of fuel

fates_fire_max_durat.long_name: spitfire parameter, fire maximum duration, Equation 14 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_miner_damp.long_name: spitfire parameter, mineral-dampening coefficient EQ A1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_miner_total.long_name: spitfire parameter, total mineral content, Table A1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_nignitions.long_name: number of annual ignitions per square km

fates_fire_part_dens.long_name: spitfire parameter, oven dry particle density, Table A1 Thonicke et al 2010

fates_fire_threshold.long_name: spitfire parameter, fire intensity threshold for tracking fires that spread

fates_frag_cwd_flig.long_name: Lignin fraction of coarse woody debris

fates_hydro_kmax_rsurf1.long_name: maximum conducitivity for unit root surface (into root)

fates_hydro_kmax_rsurf2.long_name: maximum conducitivity for unit root surface (out of root)

fates_hydro_psicap.long_name: sapwood water potential at which capillary reserves exhausted

fates_landuse_grazing_carbon_use_eff.long_name: carbon use efficiency of material eaten by grazers/browsers (i.e. amount in manure / amount consumed)

fates_landuse_grazing_maxheight.long_name: maximum height that grazers (browsers, actually) can reach

fates_landuse_grazing_nitrogen_use_eff.long_name: nitrogen use efficiency of material eaten by grazers/browsers (i.e. amount in manure / amount consumed)

fates_landuse_grazing_phosphorus_use_eff.long_name: phosphorus use efficiency of material eaten by grazers/browsers (i.e. amount in manure / amount consumed)

fates_landuse_logging_coll_under_frac.long_name: Fraction of stems killed in the understory when logging generates disturbance

fates_landuse_logging_collateral_frac.long_name: Fraction of large stems in upperstory that die from logging collateral damage

fates_landuse_logging_dbhmax.long_name: Maximum dbh below which logging is applied (unset values flag this to be unused)

fates_landuse_logging_dbhmax_infra.long_name: Tree diameter, above which infrastructure from logging does not impact damage or mortality.

fates_landuse_logging_dbhmin.long_name: Minimum dbh at which logging is applied

fates_landuse_logging_direct_frac.long_name: Fraction of stems logged directly per event

fates_landuse_logging_event_code.long_name: Integer code that options how logging events are structured

fates_landuse_logging_export_frac.long_name: fraction of trunk product being shipped offsite, the leftovers will be left onsite as large CWD

fates_landuse_logging_mechanical_frac.long_name: Fraction of stems killed due infrastructure an other mechanical means

fates_leaf_photo_temp_acclim_thome_time.long_name: Length of the window for the long-term (i.e. T_home in Kumarathunge et al 2019) exponential moving average (ema) of vegetation temperature used in photosynthesis temperature acclimation (used if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model  2)

fates_leaf_photo_temp_acclim_timescale.long_name: Length of the window for the exponential moving average (ema) of vegetation temperature used in photosynthesis temperature acclimation (used if fates_maintresp_leaf_model2 or fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model  2)

fates_maintresp_nonleaf_baserate.long_name: Base maintenance respiration rate for plant tissues, using Ryan 1991

fates_maxcohort.long_name: maximum number of cohorts per patch. Actual number of cohorts also depend on cohort fusion tolerances

fates_mort_disturb_frac.long_name: fraction of canopy mortality that results in disturbance (i.e. transfer of area from old to new patch)

fates_mort_understorey_death.long_name: fraction of plants in understorey cohort impacted by overstorey tree-fall

fates_patch_fusion_tol.long_name: minimum fraction in difference in profiles between patches

fates_phen_chilltemp.long_name: chilling day counting threshold for vegetation

fates_phen_coldtemp.long_name: vegetation temperature exceedance that flags a cold-day for leaf-drop

fates_phen_mindayson.long_name: day threshold compared against days since leaves became on-allometry

fates_phen_ncolddayslim.long_name: day threshold exceedance for temperature leaf-drop

fates_rxfire_AB.long_name: daily burn capacity of prescribed fire

fates_rxfire_fuel_max.long_name: maximum fuel load at or above which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_fuel_min.long_name: minimum fuel load at or below which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_max_threshold.long_name: maximum energy threshold at or above which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_min_frac.long_name: minimum fraction of land needs to be burnable to allow rx fire

fates_rxfire_min_threshold.long_name: minimum energy threshold at or above which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_rh_lwthreshold.long_name: minimum relative humidity threshold below which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_rh_upthreshold.long_name: maximum relative humidity threshold above which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_temp_lwthreshold.long_name: minimum temprature threshold below which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_temp_upthreshold.long_name: maximum temprature threshold above which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_wind_lwthreshold.long_name: minimum wind speed threshold below which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_rxfire_wind_upthreshold.long_name: maximum wind speed threshold above which prescribed fire is disallowed

fates_soil_salinity.long_name: soil salinity used for model when not coupled to dynamic soil salinity

fates_trs_seedling2sap_par_timescale.long_name: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of par at the seedling layer used to calculate seedling to sapling transition rates

fates_trs_seedling_emerg_h2o_timescale.long_name: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of smp used to calculate seedling emergence

fates_trs_seedling_mdd_timescale.long_name: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of moisture deficit days used to calculate seedling mortality

fates_trs_seedling_mort_par_timescale.long_name: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of par at the seedling layer used to calculate seedling mortality

fates_vai_top_bin_width.long_name: width in VAI units of uppermost leaf+stem layer scattering element in each canopy layer

fates_vai_width_increase_factor.long_name: factor by which each leaf+stem scattering element increases in VAI width (1  uniform spacing)
